“Thanks, Obama.” —@POTUS https://t.co/oeurtrUTFT

789181743806894081.text: “Never in American history has the uninsured rate been lower than it is today” —@POTUS on the #ACA https://t.co/Nn1JBpPe3W

789174355750039552.text: "You stood up for the idea that no American should have to go without the health care they need. And it's still true today." —@POTUS

789173889658068992.text: "Breaking gridlock will come only when the American people demand it." —@POTUS

789172441738129409.text: "The sum of those parts that are popular in Obamacare is Obamacare...Repealing it would make the majority of Americans worse off" —@POTUS

789171896860278784.text: "Now is not the time to move backwards on health care reform.  It’s time to move forward." —@POTUS

789171353500856321.text: "Finally, we should continue to encourage innovation by the states." —@POTUS

789171170360688640.text: RT @Hill44: Next, @POTUS says, Congress should enact a public plan fallback in some parts of the country  -- modeled on Republican idea in…

789170759574827008.text: "Provide more tax credits for more middle-income families...to help them buy insurance" —@POTUS

789170360117637120.text: "Every state should expand Medicaid." —@POTUS on what we can do to improve the #ACA

789170100758720512.text: "Progress that’s helped hold growth in the price of health care to the slowest rate in 50 years—that goes away" —… https://t.co/tUqTD7B0tv

789169759204048896.text: "I can tell you what won’t work: repealing the Affordable Care Act." —@POTUS on improving the #ACA

789169512536944641.text: "With the ability to shop around on https://t.co/5zeR2RPWAE...people can find plans for prices even lower than this year’s prices" —@POTUS

789168581640466438.text: "There are some states where there’s still not enough competition between insurers." —@POTUS

789168290027364352.text: "If the 19 states who so far have not expanded Medicaid would just do so, another 4 million people would have coverage right now." —@POTUS

789167095044911104.text: "The Affordable Care Act has done for us what it was designed to do: It gave us affordable health care." —@POTUS

789167017450278912.text: "Most people—today—can find a plan for less than $75 a month at the https://t.co/GNfbftrfo3 marketplace" —@POTUS

789166448056766464.text: "We gave states funding to expand Medicaid...more than 4 million people have coverage who didn’t have it before" —@POTUS

789165326088802305.text: "We made it illegal to discriminate against people with pre-existing conditions." —@POTUS

789165167716077569.text: "Because of the law, your annual out-of pocket spending is capped...Young people can stay on their parents' plan" —@POTUS

789164659311976448.text: "We can do even more...if we're honest about what's working, what needs fixing, and how to fix it." —@POTUS on improving the #ACA

789164310245146624.text: "And that’s true across the board—it has dropped among women, young adults, Latinos, African Americans." —@POTUS on the uninsured rate #ACA

789164200643862528.text: "Never in American history has the uninsured rate been lower than it is today." —@POTUS on the importance of the… https://t.co/EKHvvoln7p

789163902646890496.text: "Because of this law...another 20 million Americans now know the financial security of health insurance." —@POTUS o… https://t.co/3CQrAueMQQ

789163506046078976.text: "It was about children like Zoe Lihn...halfway to hitting her lifetime insurance cap before she was old enough to walk" —@POTUS on the #ACA

789163008014503936.text: "Health care is not just a privilege, but a right for every single American." —@POTUS speaking on the #ACA

760249036091686912.text: "It’s through your sacrifices that this country we love remains free and strong." —@POTUS to America's veterans: https://t.co/8k4avKlocb

760241362541260800.text: Here's how we're making it easier for veterans to access the care they need through https://t.co/gZga6swBZe: https://t.co/MQJiRQ5CRQ

760238442991058944.text: “I do have to point out—Republicans in Congress have proposed cutting my VA budget.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ https://t.co/MQJiRQ5CRQ

760226603247013888.text: RT @TaskandPurpose: An Exclusive From @POTUS: Keeping Our Covenant With America’s Veterans https://t.co/q7LexBuEIy https://t.co/S795ETZaR7

760220290215452672.text: "No war should ever be forgotten and no veteran should ever be overlooked." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ #DAVets16 https://t.co/18Pmqh9HXU

760196156617920512.text: "No one—no one—has given more for our freedom and security than our Gold Star families." —@POTUS https://t.co/t5oElG6szB

760192921643515905.text: "Don’t just talk about standing with veterans—don’t just talk about me—do something to support our veterans" —@POTUS https://t.co/MQJiRQ5CRQ

760187522664148992.text: “We’ve increased funding for veterans mental health care by more than 75%—billions more dollars" —@POTUS #DAVets16 https://t.co/P0elMg1yW6

760185052122771456.text: "If you want dedication, if you want to get the job done, hire a vet! Hire a military spouse!” —@POTUS #DAVets16 https://t.co/Vbkb1li4kq

760177728997957637.text: "When we take care of each other, when we uphold that sacred covenant, then there is nothing we can’t do." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ.

760177188251508736.text: “To every company in America—if you want talent, if you want dedication...hire a vet! Hire a military spouse!” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760177045078802437.text: “We’ve cut veterans unemployment by more than half—down to 4.2 percent...lower than the national average." —@POTUS https://t.co/LKFyeuIIyc

760176711342264320.text: “Starting this fall, we’ll close loopholes to protect our troops and military families from predatory pay-day lenders. ” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760176432546930688.text: “We’ve helped more than 1.6 million veterans and their families realize their dream of an education." —@POTUS https://t.co/RnznDWwkDy

760176201465856000.text: “We will not stop until every veteran who fought for America has a home in America. This is something we've got to get done.” —@POTUS

760176034515787777.text: "I can announce that, nationally, we have now reduced the number of homeless veterans by 47%—nearly half." —@POTUS https://t.co/pwh6Q2uE2s

760175811659837440.text: “We’ve got to keep fighting for the dignity of every veteran—and that includes ending the tragedy...of veteran homelessness" —@POTUS

760175250856218624.text: “From it's peak, we’ve now slashed that backlog by nearly 90 percent.” —@POTUS on the disability claims backlog https://t.co/N0lKrnnvOG

760174971964448768.text: “Here’s one thing we will not do—we cannot outsource and privatize health care for America’s veterans.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760174716363472896.text: “We’ve hired thousands more doctors, nurses and staff; opened more clinical space” —@POTUS. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW

760174424712544256.text: RT @WHLive: "When too many veterans still aren’t getting the care they need—we all have to be outraged. We all have to do better."  —@POTUS

760174054124900352.text: “We’ve increased funding for veterans mental health care by more than 75%—billions more dollars" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ https://t.co/Mf5rmA4c4m

760173843956719616.text: “500,000 veterans...have stepped forward & donated your health & genetic data for research, which brings us halfway to our goal” —@POTUS

760173744329416705.text: RT @WHLive: “We’re reaching more veterans...with telemedicine—so you can see someone at the VA without ever leaving home.” —@POTUS

760173598535393281.text: “We now have a designated women’s health provider at all VA clinics to make sure our women veterans get the tailored care” —@POTUS

760173481044553728.text: RT @WHLive: Veterans can now finally apply for VA health care anytime...in as little as 20 minutes. Just go to https://t.co/P4kfdfv6ud.” —@…

760173336240410624.text: RT @WHLive: “Thanks to the Affordable Care Act—Obamacare—veterans not covered by the VA now have access to quality, affordable health care”…

760173191318822918.text: “I do have to point out—Republicans in Congress have proposed cutting my VA budget.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW

760172932416974848.text: RT @WHLive: “Altogether, we will have increased funding for veterans by more than 85 percent.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760172896106913792.text: RT @WHLive: “About 200,000 service members are becoming veterans every year. And America’s got to be there for you for a lifetime.” —@POTUS…

760172588974747648.text: “Working together over these past eight years, we’ve delivered real progress for our veterans.  And we can’t let up." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760172246425935876.text: "The citizens you kept safe—we pledge to take care of you and your families when you come home. That's a sacred covenant" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760172056696598528.text: “America’s commitment to our veterans is not just lines in a budget…Our commitment to our veterans is a sacred covenant.” —@POTUS

760171972680638468.text: RT @WHLive: "We believe in taking care of each other, lifting each other up, leaving no one behind" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760171760222253056.text: "This country that we love hasn’t just endured. We’ve thrived and overcome challenges that would have broken a lesser nation" —@POTUS

760170882144751616.text: "No one—no one—has given more for our freedom and security than our Gold Star families." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ https://t.co/4xONzNk04z

760170721314152448.text: "America’s military is the most capable fighting force in history—and we’re going to keep it that way.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760170589159952384.text: “Our Marines are the world’s only truly expeditionary force. We have the finest Coast Guard.”

760170449380659201.text: “Our Navy is the largest and most lethal in the world. The precision and reach of our Air Force is unmatched.” —@POTUS

760170351166824448.text: “Let’s get some facts straight. America’s Army is the best-trained, best-equipped land force on the planet.” —@POTUS

760170231893463041.text: "As Commander-in-Chief, I’m pretty tired of some folks trash talking America’s military and troops."  —@POTUS at @DAVHQ

760169801465597952.text: "When I came into office, we had nearly 180,000 American troops in Afghanistan and Iraq. Today, that number is less than 15,000.” —@POTUS

760169589107990533.text: RT @WHLive: “No war should ever be forgotten and no veteran should ever be overlooked.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ. Watch live: https://t.co/WkFIANG…

760169216339238915.text: "We’ve stood together at Normandy to thank a generation—among them, my grandfather...that literally saved the world" https://t.co/pEd4qLQLaF

760169015385976833.text: “Some of the most unforgettable experiences I’d had have been the moments I’ve spent with you—America’s veterans and your families.” —@POTUS

760168779443601409.text: "It's good to be back with the Disabled American Veterans. What a journey we've had together" —@POTUS. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW

755062388152537088.text: "Join me in saluting this proud American soldier and veteran who reminds us all of the true meaning of service—Chuck Kettles." #MedalOfHonor

755060988374818816.text: "A soldier never leaves his comrades behind. Chuck Kettles honored that creed—not with a single act of heroism, but over and over and over."

755059514198589441.text: "To the dozens of American soldiers he saved in Vietnam half a century ago, Chuck is the reason they lived and came home." #MedalOfHonor

755058860348542976.text: "Of all the military decorations our nation can bestow, we have none higher than the #MedalOfHonor." —@POTUS: https://t.co/bBzKRUNNip
